Solo Multiplayer About
Pure mathematics is, in its way, the poetry of logical ideas - Albert Einstein Without mathematics, there’s nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers. - Shakuntala Devi Mathematics is the music of reason. - James Joseph Sylvester There should be no such thing as boring mathematics. - Edsger W. Dijkstra It is impossible to be a mathematician without being a poet in soul. - Sofia Kovalevskaya Mathematics consists of proving the most obvious thing in the least obvious way. - George Pólya Why do children dread mathematics? Because of the wrong approach. Because it is looked at as a subject. - Shakuntala Devi The only way to learn mathematics is to do mathematics. - Paul R. Halmos The essence of math is not to make simple things complicated, but to make complicated things simple. - Stan Gudder In mathematics, you don’t understand things. You just get used to them. - John von Neumann

How to play? ?
The secret number lies between 2 given values. Find as many as you can before the timer runs out. The secret number lies between 2 given values. Be careful, if you get one wrong, its game over! The secret number lies between 2 given values. Use your luck to find this number.
Run like HELL! Answer as many as you can before the timer runs out! Its game over! No time to die, if you get one wrong… Practice well! Take your time answering the questions.
